data.text: @mdccclxx When will  Britain do the same?  I am getting awfully tired of covid testing, then getting on a flight with about five people sitting around me coughing and sneezing, but I am the only one who has to test because…well you know why.
@mdccclxx Yet another misleading effort by mainstream media. It’s not the refugees that changed the Covid Law. The narrative can no longer hide the fact that jabs cause excess deaths!
@mdccclxx @lawabidingtwtzn But....but it’s deadly!!😱 Should have had the war in 2020!
@mdccclxx You're perfectly right. It is scaring me.
@CorBlanche That's what happens when the lunatics run the asylum I'm afraid.
@mdccclxx Well, not in Germany. The Ukrainians had to sleep in the trainstation, because they didn't have the necessary certificate for a nearby hotel...
